name: Take the Reins
description:
It is 1863 and the gold rush in Otago, New Zealand is in full swing. You need to bring the miners to their camp through a treacherous gorge. Take care, because if you lose a wheel you will be out of control!

Use the Left and Right arrow keys or A and D to control the horses and get the miners safely to their camp.

Code by Tim Neumegen
Game Art by Veronica Neumegen
Music by David Suggate
Cover Art by John Neumegen

Made in Phaser from Phaser Jam Template
